Free Consultation Today!

The freelance design solution for Barcelona

Hi, my name is Lukasz Adam and I am a Barcelona based Freelance Web Designer, who provides affordable web design solutions to other freelancers, agencies, entrepreneurs or for your personal projects.

I do web development, User Interface Design & SEO Marketing. My Web Design services extend throughout the Barcelona area (including Girona, Tarragona, Montserrat, Santa Susana, Sitges, Vilanova i la Geltrú).

Since I am a Freelancer, I very often meet my lovely customers in Sant Pere, Santa Caterina i la Ribera, because it is not so crowded like Barcelona’s touristic parts -la rambla-, especially in the summer months. However I am also able to work remotely from all parts of the world.

Inspiring Freelance Web Design

Inspired by Barcelonas beautiful nature like the Llobregat and the Besòs river, my goal is to provide Antoni Gaudis Hometown with individualised solutions for web design, web development, wordpress customisation & search engine optimization (on-page as well as off-page seo).

Whether it be for an individual like an entrepreneur, a personal trainer, or a famous blogger. I can help you to fulfil your project with a personalized user interface design, a solution for your web hosting problems (without monthly costs) and I can make your website more alive with my favourite coding language - Javascript (ES6).

Furthermore I can take a look at your homepage and provide it with an engaging User Experience. My goal is to leave the web a better place. Since I am already talking about User Experience, one thing that goes hand in hand with UX is SEO Marketing. SEO solves a VERY common problem most webmasters suffer from: traffic.

Want to see more web design?

Check out my Dribble page, for more of my website designs and illustrations.

My Web Design Services


I currently work with clients of several types of businesses: large-corporations, home-based business like bloggers, digital normads, local shops, artists, photographers, developers, stores and restaurants.

I provide web solutions for 2023 and every website that I code or that I design the User Interface for, is made responsive, which means you can check it on your smartphone without any problems.

I love to provide the whole area of barcelona with modern & excellent service & web design solutions.

Including:


  • User Interface Design (Websites, Apps, Mobile Responsive Pages)
  • Web Development (HTML, CSS, Javascript, PHP, Angular.JS)
  • WordPress Solutions (Custom Made Plugins, adding functions, securing your data)
  • Web Hosting Help (With a GitHub Account and a static website you can host your page without monthly costs!)
  • SEO Marketing (On-Page SEO, Off-Page SEO, Content Marketing, Internal Linking, Title & Tag Adjustment, Skyscraper Content)
  • Responsive Webdesign Making your Page perfectly fitted for smartphones and tablets.
